svg.title: ST-14: Strategic Testing Risk Assessment Matrix
svg.desc: Intelligent risk-based testing prioritization using multi-dimensional risk assessment, automated scoring algorithms, and strategic resource allocation to maximize testing effectiveness and optimize coverage.
svg.text: Intelligent risk-based testing prioritization with automated scoring and resource optimization

g.text: • Focus: Edge cases, integration points, error handling
• Cost Savings: $127K annually vs traditional approach
• Payback Period: 3.2 months with sustained benefits
✓ Focus manual testing on critical payment flows
• 95% accuracy in risk prediction (up from 45% baseline)
• 70% reduction in manual risk assessment time
• Testing effort optimization: 76% resource efficiency gain
• Week 5-6: Team training and workflow optimization
